fullDescription.intro:
This node utilizes the Apache Spark implementation of a Decision Tree learning algorithm. It outputs the original data and the decision tree predictions for the result preview as well as the learned model for later application.
Please note that all data must be numeric, including the label column. Use the corresponding conversion nodes to convert nominal values to numeric columns.
The node can be configured as follows:
fullDescription.option: Maximum number of bins used for discretizing continuous features and for choosing how to split on features at each node.
Criterion used for information gain calculation. Available methods: "gini" (recommended) or "entropy".
The feature columns to learn the model from.
